title: LangChain vs Ray: Which AI Tool is Better in 2026?
metaDescription: Compare LangChain vs Ray. See pricing, features, pros & cons to choose the best AI tool for your needs in 2026.
introduction: Choosing between LangChain and Ray? These AI tools serve different but sometimes overlapping purposes, each with unique strengths. This comparison breaks down the key differences to help you decide.

sections.title: Overview: LangChain vs Ray
paragraphs: LangChain (nlp) is Framework for developing applications powered by language models with tools for chaining prompts, agents, and memory management.. It's known for LLM, Prompt Chaining, Agents.

Ray (ml frameworks) is Unified framework for scaling AI and Python applications, providing distributed computing primitives and ML libraries for parallel processing.. Users choose it for Distributed Computing, Scaling, Auto-scaling.

sections.title: Key Features
paragraphs: LangChain: LLM application development, Prompt chaining, Agent frameworks
Ray: Distributed computing, Auto-scaling, ML ecosystem integration

verdict: Both LangChain and Ray are excellent AI tools. Your choice depends on specific needs: LangChain for LLM, Ray for Distributed Computing.
